message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $180. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I think the product is worth less than $180 to me. Can you offer a price closer to $120?
Bob, I understand your perspective, but I need a higher price to make this worthwhile. How about $150?
Alice, thank you for your response. Considering my needs, I believe $120 would be the most reasonable price for the product. Could we meet at this price?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. How about we split the difference and settle on $135?
Alice, I appreciate your efforts in negotiating. Considering my budget constraints, I am willing to pay up to $120 for the product. Could we possibly meet at this price?
